productText:
000
FZUS56 KMFR 150911
CWFMFR

Coastal Waters Forecast
National Weather Service Medford, OR
210 AM PDT Thu Jun 15 2023

Coastal waters from Florence Oregon to Point St. George California
and westward 60 nm.

PZZ300-151600-
210 AM PDT Thu Jun 15 2023


SYNOPSIS FOR THE SOUTHERN OREGON COASTAL WATERS...Strong 
high pressure offshore and a thermal trough along the coast will 
produce moderate to strong north winds and steep to very steep seas 
tonight through Friday. Winds will be strongest during the 
afternoons and evenings during this period with gales south of Port 
Orford. Hazardous conditions could linger south of Cape Blanco into 
Saturday, but conditions should improve in all areas Sunday into 
Monday.

$$

PZZ350-151600-
Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm-
210 AM PDT Thu Jun 15 2023

...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

.TODAY...N wind 10 to 15 kt...rising to 20 kt late afternoon.
Cape Arago southward, N wind 15 to 20 kt. Wind waves 3 to 5 ft.
Swell NW 7 to 8 ft at 9 seconds... subsiding to NW 6 ft at
9 seconds in the afternoon. 
.TONIGHT...N wind 15 to 20 kt. Wind waves 3 to 5 ft. Swell NW
5 to 6 ft at 8 seconds. 
.FRI...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft. W swell 2 ft at
9 seconds. 
.FRI NIGHT...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft in the evening...
becoming 2 ft or less. Swell NW 2 to 3 ft. 
.SAT...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft. Swell NW 3 to 4 ft...
building to NW 5 ft in the afternoon. 
.SAT NIGHT...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft. NW swell 3 to
5 ft...building to 6 ft after midnight. 
.SUN...N wind 5 kt...backing to W. Wind waves 2 ft or less. Swell
NW 6 ft. 
.MON...SW wind 5 kt...veering to W. Wind waves 2 ft or less.
Swell NW 6 ft.  

$$

PZZ356-151600-
Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm-
210 AM PDT Thu Jun 15 2023

...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

.TODAY...N wind 30 kt...rising to gales 35 kt late afternoon.
Within 5 nm of Brookings southward, N wind 10 to 20 kt...backing
to NW 15 to 25 kt late afternoon. Wind waves 6 to 9 ft. Swell NW
7 to 8 ft at 9 seconds...subsiding to NW 6 ft at 9 seconds in the
afternoon. 
.TONIGHT...N gales 35 kt...easing to 30 kt in the late evening
and overnight. Within 5 nm of Brookings southward, N wind 30 kt...
becoming NW 10 to 15 kt after midnight. Combined seas 9 to 12 ft
dominant period 9 seconds...subsiding to 7 to 10 ft dominant
period 8 seconds after midnight. 
.FRI...N wind 20 to 25 kt...becoming NW 30 kt late in the
afternoon. Within 5 nm of Brookings southward, N wind 10 to
15 kt...becoming NW 20 to 25 kt late in the afternoon. Wind waves
5 to 8 ft. Mixed swell W 2 ft at 9 seconds and SW 1 ft at
17 seconds. 
.FRI NIGHT...N wind 30 kt...easing to 15 to 20 kt after midnight.
Within 5 nm of Brookings southward, NW wind 15 to 25 kt...
becoming N 10 kt after midnight. Wind waves 5 to 8 ft...subsiding
to 3 to 6 ft after midnight. Mixed swell W 2 ft and S 1 ft. 
.SAT...N wind 15 to 20 kt...backing to NW 20 to 25 kt in the
afternoon. Within 5 nm of Brookings southward, N wind 10 to
15 kt. Wind waves 3 to 6 ft. NW swell 3 to 4 ft. Less than 2 ft. 
.SAT NIGHT...N wind 10 to 20 kt. Wind waves 3 to 6 ft. NW swell
3 ft...building to 6 ft after midnight. 
.SUN...N wind 15 kt...backing to NW 5 to 10 kt. Wind waves 3 to
4 ft...becoming 2 ft or less. Swell NW 5 to 6 ft. 
.MON...NW wind 5 to 10 kt...veering to N after midnight. Wind
waves 2 ft or less. Swell NW 5 to 6 ft. 

$$

PZZ370-151600-
Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm-
210 AM PDT Thu Jun 15 2023

...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

.TODAY...N wind 15 to 20 kt. Wind waves 3 to 6 ft. Swell NW 7 to
8 ft at 9 seconds...subsiding to NW 6 ft at 9 seconds in the
afternoon. 
.TONIGHT...N wind 15 to 20 kt. Wind waves 3 to 5 ft. Swell NW
5 to 6 ft at 8 seconds. 
.FRI...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 to 4 ft. Mixed swell W
2 ft at 9 seconds and SW 1 ft at 17 seconds. 
.FRI NIGHT...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft. Swell W 2 to
3 ft. 
.SAT...N wind 15 to 20 kt. Wind waves 3 to 4 ft. NW swell 4 to
5 ft. Less than 2 ft. 
.SAT NIGHT...N wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 to 4 ft. Swell NW
5 to 6 ft. 
.SUN...NW wind 10 kt...becoming 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft in
the morning...becoming 2 ft or less, then... becoming 3 ft after
midnight. Swell NW 6 ft. 
.MON...NW wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft in the morning...
becoming 2 ft or less, then...becoming 3 ft in the evening...
becoming 2 ft or less. Swell NW 6 ft.  

$$

PZZ376-151600-
Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm-
210 AM PDT Thu Jun 15 2023

...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

.TODAY...Northern portion, N wind 20 to 25 kt. Southern portion,
N wind 30 kt...rising to gales 35 kt early in the morning, then...
easing to 30 kt in the late morning and early afternoon...rising
to gales 35 kt late afternoon. Wind waves 7 to 10 ft. Swell NW
7 to 8 ft at 9 seconds... subsiding to NW 6 ft at 9 seconds in
the afternoon. 
.TONIGHT...Northern portion, N wind 20 to 25 kt. Southern
portion, N gales 35 kt...becoming 30 kt after midnight. Wind
waves 7 to 10 ft. Swell NW 5 to 6 ft at 8 seconds. 
.FRI...N wind 20 to 25 kt northern portion and N 30 kt southern
portion. Wind waves 6 to 9 ft. Mixed swell W 2 ft at 9 seconds
and SW 1 ft at 17 seconds. 
.FRI NIGHT...N wind 15 to 20 kt northern portion and N 30 kt
southern portion. Wind waves 5 to 8 ft. Mixed swell W 2 ft and S
1 ft. 
.SAT...N wind 20 to 25 kt. Wind waves 4 to 6 ft. Swell NW 3 ft...
building to NW 4 to 5 ft in the afternoon. 
.SAT NIGHT...N wind 15 to 20 kt northern portion and N 15 to
25 kt southern portion. Wind waves 4 to 6 ft. NW swell 3 to
4 ft...building to 6 ft after midnight. 
.SUN...NW wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 to 4 ft. Swell NW 6 ft. 
.MON...NW wind 10 to 15 kt. Wind waves 3 ft... becoming 2 ft or
less. Swell NW 6 ft.  

$$
